text: Răzvan Lucian Greu (born 16 March 1995) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Farul Constanța.Greu Razvan Lucian. fcfarulconstanta.ro ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:FC Universitatea Cluj players Category:CS Mioveni players Category:FC Botoșani players Category:Sepsi OSK Sfântu Gheorghe players Category:FC Farul Constanța players Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Răzvan Greu
